Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2007 10:57AM Catherineanne wrote: Thank you for your prayers.  I think I'm going to need as many as I can get.  I'm more or less alone with my fears at the moment. I can't tell anyone I know because I don't want to worry any one else in my family.  They've been through a lot already this month.  I hope I'm over-reacting because of the fright we've all had.  Usually in this situation I would have told my mum (she was my best friend), but she isn't here anymore.
Posts.Title: Bleeding from one nipple Catherineanne LoriG
